conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the baffles to predict which container it will flow into.
Identify points A, B, and C as outlets or exits for liquid flow.
Liquid will flow from points A, B, and C through baffles towards the closest container.
Determine the container closest to the outlet of points A, B, and C.
Identify container D, E, or F as options for liquid flow.
Select the correct container based on analysis of flow direction.
